name: @archerjessop/utilities
description: Shared utilities for ArcherJessop property analysis tools

scripts.build: rollup -c && mkdir -p dist/styles && cp src/styles/* dist/styles/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags && npm publish --access public

author: ArcherJessop
